
Chic ChangeLog
==============

1.1.0 (2013-08-06)
------------------

* Add Bower support
* Update dependencies
* Improve browser test runner


1.0.3 (2013-03-12)
------------------

* Support AMD-style module loaders
* Support Node 0.10.x
* General house-keeping


1.0.2 (2013-02-04)
------------------

* Overhaul of build tools
* Fix issues with a 'sup' property being created on objects


1.0.1 (2012-12-13)
------------------

* General house-keeping


1.0.0 (2012-12-11)
------------------

* API changes for non-dependency-managed users
* Stable release


0.0.3 (2012-12-08)
------------------

* API changes for non-dependency-managed users


0.0.2 (2012-12-07)
------------------

* Bug-fix release


0.0.1 (2012-12-07)
------------------

* Initial release
